sourcesContent:
import {
  Card,
  CardBody,
  CardHeader,
  CardPoster,
  CardText,
  CardTitle,
  CardFooter,
  Tag,
  Avatar,
  UserBox,
  UserInfo,
  UserName,
  Date,
} from './BlogCard.styled';

export const BlogCard = ({
  name,
  poster,
  postedAt,
  tag,
  title,
  avatar,
  description,
}) => {
  return (
    <Card>
      <CardHeader>
        <CardPoster
          src="https://source.unsplash.com/600x400/?computer"
          alt="card__image"
        />
      </CardHeader>
      <CardBody>
        <Tag>{tag}</Tag>
        <CardTitle>{title}</CardTitle>
        <CardText>
          Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit. Sequi
          perferendis molestiae non nemo doloribus. Doloremque, nihil! At ea
          atque quidem!
        </CardText>
      </CardBody>
      <CardFooter>
        <UserBox>
          <Avatar src="https://i.pravatar.cc/40?img=1" alt="Jane Doe" />
          <UserInfo>
            <UserName>Jane Doe</UserName>
            <Date>2h ago</Date>
          </UserInfo>
        </UserBox>
      </CardFooter>
    </Card>
  );
};
